event.title: flows through central Shanghai, although it is now

data.event: The name refers to its historic position as "The East Bank" of the Huangpu River, which flows through central Shanghai, although it is now administered as the Pudong New Area, a state-level new area which extends all the way to the East China Sea.

event.title: was originally established as a county in 1958

data.event: Pudong was originally established as a county in 1958 until 1961 which the county was split among Huangpu, Yangpu, Nanshi, Wusong and Chuansha County.
Pudong was originally established as a county in 1958 until 1961 which the county was split among Huangpu, Yangpu, Nanshi, Wusong and Chuansha County.

event.title: October 1, 1992 the original area of Pudong County and Chuansha County merged and established

data.event: In October 1, 1992 the original area of Pudong County and Chuansha County merged and established Pudong New Area.
